posts.description: Dancing in the trees üå≤Spring has finally sprung here in the Pacific Northwest and it's about time. Getting outside and breathing it all in. üòä Wearing @aloyoga - I love how the white pops against the green. üíö Thank you for this capture and adventure to these suspension bridges @apearlst! üòò #aloyoga #beagoddess #getoutside #balance #dance #nature #freshair #spring #breathe #green #pnw #pacificnorthwest #flexible #stretch #yoga

The eagle has landed! üíó First time playing with eagle legs in monolimb with @apearlst and it was so solid! Our acro is progressing nicely but it's time to step it up! Headed down to San Diego to see @acropediaorg at the AcroLoveFest at the end of June and cannot wait to play!! üíô Wearing @myinnerfire on my eagle ü¶Ö legs. üòä#balance #partneryoga #trust #communication #blue #pnw #pacificnorthwest #healthyliving #healthylife #strong #yoga #acroyoga #aylifestyle

Tomorrow's pose, day 7, for #TwistOutTheToxins is ardha matsyendrasana - Half Lord of the Fishes pose or seated spinal twist. ‚ù§Ô∏è Start seated, draw your knees up towards your torso, then slide your right foot (or left, but for the sake of this description, we'll go with right) under your left leg to the outside of your left hip. Step the left foot over the right leg and plant your foot on the floor. The left knee will point straight up. Take your left hand behind your back, lengthen the arm and use the palm or fingertips to help lengthen spine. Place your right upper arm on the outside of your left thigh near the knee. Draw your front torso and inner left thigh together - beginning to twist the torso away from your legs, twisting open to the left. Try to keep the shoulders in one line. Press the inner left foot into the floor and lengthen the front body. Lean the upper torso back slightly while lengthening the tailbone into the floor. With every inhalation lift through the chest, pushing the fingertips against the floor to lengthen the spine. Twist a little more with every exhale breath. ‚ù§Ô∏è Intensify with a bind! Check in with @karlatafra tomorrow evening for day 8. Big thanks to the rest of the crew - @pocketdwarf and @rebeccaleann_ and sponsor @yoga_democracy. I'm wearing the Robin's Roses leggings from the @robinmartinyoga collection. üåπüòä‚ù§Ô∏èüì∑ by the beautiful @karlatafra üòòüôèüèª #twist #challenge #balance #fitness #breathe #blackandwhitephotography #blackandwhite #bnw #bnw_captures #strong #stretch #igyoga #igfitness #instafit #rose #fitfashion #healthylife #healthyliving #yoga #yogachallenge

When I see tracks, I just can't help myself. ‚ù§Ô∏è(These tracks are out of service) I'd only connected my foot to my head one time before this on the tracks, so it was fun to play with it again. üòä Wearing @aloyoga - the long sleeves were helpful, it was windy and cold, despite the appearance of a warm day! #aloyoga #beagoddess #flexible #strong #train #tracks #fitness #stretch #pnw #igfitness #healthylife #healthyliving #pacificnorthwest #getoutside #freshair #breathe

This dancer/chopasana hybrid has become one of my favorite shapes since the first time trying it. I've made some progress here in the depth - fingers just touching the ground. Maybe one day hand flat on the floor? If it happens, it happens. If not, that's fine too. Enjoying the path along the way. ‚ù§Ô∏è Wearing @bodyangelactivewear - use ROBIN15 for a discount. üòò Thanks for your mad photo skills @apearlst! üòä‚ù§Ô∏è #stretch #strong #balance #breathe #red #houndstooth #concrete #yoga #fitfashion #fitnessmotivation #igyoga #igfitness #healthylife #healthyliving #flexible #bodyangelactivewear

Parivrtta Navasana or revolved boat pose for day 3 (tomorrow) of #TwistOutTheToxins! üíóThis pose offers all the benefits of navasana with the added twist! To move into this one, start by setting up navasana (boat pose). Sit on the floor or ground with your legs out in front of you, hands just behind the hips, fingers pointing toward the feet. Press through the palms to lift the sternum and lengthen the spine (try to avoid rounding the spine). Lean back slightly, and find balance on sit bones and tailbone. Begin to lift your feet, bend your knees and draw your knees toward your chest. For the sake of this explanation, take your left ankle and cross it under your right ankle. With the knees bent, reach your left hand across and take the big toe of your left foot with your first and middle fingers. As you work to straighten your legs, begin to reach your right arm back. Inhale to lift long through the spine, exhale to twist open to the right. Gaze to the right to challenge the balance. Keep hands grounded and knees bent (even toes on the floor, if needed) and twist open to modify. Check in with @karlatafra tomorrow evening for day 4. Big thanks to the rest of the crew - @pocketdwarf and @rebeccaleann_ and sponsor @yoga_democracy. I'm wearing the Artizen leggings from the @robinmartinyoga collection. Use TWIST20 for 20% off at @yoga_democracy. ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for this capture, @apearlst üòäüôèüèª #challenge #balance #fitness #yoga #breathe #balance #healthylife #healthyliving #yogachallenge #stretch #strong #fitness #pnw #pacificnorthwest #seattle #spring

Open heart stretches. ‚ù§Ô∏è Fashion Revolution Day is April 24, and to celebrate, I‚Äôm wearing @Athleta for @FairTradeUSA‚Äôs Fashion Revolution Wardrobe Contest. If you're not familiar with @FairTradeUSA, it's a non-profit organization that ensures a safe work environment, quality products and protecting the environment. Each of the #FairTradeCertified outfits in the contest helps factory workers build sustainable livelihoods and work in safe conditions.  Visit http://bit.ly/2oGcMaF and vote for my outfit through a quick heart/repin! #WhoMadeMyClothes #WeWearFairTrade‚Äù Pose inspired by @adellbridgesyoga ‚ù§Ô∏è

Getting a lift in a bow variation from the fabulous @thomas.eagen ‚ù§Ô∏è My leggings are @myinnerfire - use RMYOGA15 for a discount. üòä #base #fly #clouds #aylifestyle #acro #acroyoga #yoga #flexible #stretch #trust #communication #fitness #balance #breathe #play #pnw #pacificnorthwest

I'm so excited to announce #TwistOutTheToxins, a yoga challenge designed to detox, de-stress and improve digestive function!  We liken it to the spring cleaning of our bodies. üå∏ We are excited to share some of our favorite twists during this twelve day yoga challenge. We will be wearing three new leggings designs from @yoga_democracy from the @robinmartinyoga collaboration. I'm so excited to share these designs!! Please join me and hosts @pocketdwarf, @karlatafra and @rebeccaleann_  with sponsor @yoga_democracy üíêüå∑üíï ü¶ãüå∑üå±‚òÄÔ∏èü§∏üèø‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Here is how you can play along:

1‚É£ Repost this picture to your page. 
2‚É£ Follow all hosts and our sponsors

3‚É£ Participate daily with new photos/videos and make sure to tag us, our sponsor and #TwistOutTheToxins

4‚É£ Have fun and do your best!  All levels welcomed! There are appropriate levels of each pose and modifications for all levels. 
5‚É£ Three winners will be chosen randomly at the end of the challenge based on full participation and following/tagging hosts and sponsors to win gift cards from @yoga_democracy. During the challenge, use the code TWIST20 for 20% off on the @yogademocracy website
